org.bson.util
Class AbstractCopyOnWriteMap<K,V,M extends java.util.Map<K,V>>

java.lang.Object
  org.bson.util.AbstractCopyOnWriteMap<K,V,M>
Type Parameters:
K - The key type
V - The value type
M - the internal Map or extension for things like sorted and navigable maps.
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<K,V>, java.util.Map<K,V>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CopyOnWriteMap
@ThreadSafe
abstract class AbstractCopyOnWriteMap<K,V,M extends java.util.Map<K,V>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<K,V>, java.io.Serializable

Abstract base class for COW Map implementations that delegate to an internal map.
